trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> objects which persist in a Windows Address Book.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>保存 Windows 通訊錄中的物件。

trans-unit.source: This class has no public constructors, since a reference to it is returned by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會有沒有公用建構函式，因為它的參考由<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>類別。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>

trans-unit.source: Address books that are associated with <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> management include those associated with the host peer and a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 位址相關聯的書籍<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>管理包含這些主機的對等電腦與遠端對等相關聯。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: Either computer may collaborate with other peers; when a peer is local to the remote peer but not the host peer, it can be added to the ContactManager of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: 任何一部電腦可能會與其他對等節點; 共同作業遠端對等，但不是主機對等電腦的本機對等時，它會加入至主應用程式之對等 ContactManager。

trans-unit.source: Certain operations on the ContactManager class, such as <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.AddContact%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact%2A>, correlate to the associated operations being performed on the Windows Address book of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 特定作業時 ContactManager 類別，例如<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.AddContact%2A>和<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact%2A>、 相關聯的作業正在執行 Windows 通訊錄的遠端對等關聯。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.AddContact%2A>

trans-unit.source: The host peer has access to this persistent storage for <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> information, which can be associated with the applications in which a peer intends to participate.
trans-unit.target: 主機的對等電腦具有存取權的這個永續性儲存體<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>可以與對等打算參與的應用程式相關聯的資訊。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> can identify itself as a user of a ContactManager persistent store on a computer.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>可以為 ContactManager 持續性存放區的電腦上的使用者識別自己。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the local peer.
Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance to add to <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
The specified by peerContact already exists.
peerContact is .
The specified peerContact has been disposed.
- The specified by peerContact could not be reconstituted from its serialized XML format.
trans-unit.target: - 所指定 peerContact 不能重新組成從其序列化的 XML 格式。

trans-unit.source: - Unable to add the local peer to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> instance being constructed.
trans-unit.target: -無法加入本機的對等<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>所建構的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> has changed.
This method only returns applications published by contacts of the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會傳回呼叫端的對等的連絡人所發行的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 可能會引發此事件之前，遠端對等的目前使用者必須訂閱遠端對等共同作業事件。

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> method.
This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
To be added.
The calling object has been disposed.
Creates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>所指定的執行個體<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to associate with the new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance.
A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
peerNearMe is .
This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
- The contact manager of the remote peer passed in peerNearMe could not be reached, or the contact could not be read from it.
trans-unit.target: -連絡人的管理員，遠端對等的傳入 peerNearMe 無法連線或無法從它讀取連絡人。

trans-unit.source: - The instance passed in peerNearMe has no endpoints set on it.
trans-unit.target: - 中傳遞的執行個體 peerNearMe 沒有任何端點上設定。

trans-unit.source: Creates a contact instance for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的連絡人執行個體<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to associate with the new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance.
A user-defined <xref:System.Object> that contains information about the CreateContactAsync operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義<xref:System.Object>包含 CreateContactAsync 作業的相關資訊。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: It will be passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: 它將會傳遞給回呼的非同步作業的識別。

trans-unit.source: userToken already exists and is in use.
peerNearMe is .
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
- The specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance has no endpoints set on it.
trans-unit.target: -指定<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>執行個體沒有任何設於其上的端點。

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact*> method has completed.
This event is raised when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync%2A> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: 會引發這個事件時<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync%2A>方法已完成。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is also raised if the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> operation completes in error or is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 它也會引發如果<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>作業完成的錯誤，或已取消。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
To be added.
The calling object has been disposed.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the local peer.
Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
peerContact is .

Removes the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> associated with the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*> from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the local peer.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>指定相關聯<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>從<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>本機對等。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.

The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> associated with <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*> could not be found in the contact manager.
peerName is .
This object has had <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.Dispose*> previously called on it and cannot be used for future operations.
trans-unit.target: 此物件已經有<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.Dispose*>先前在其上呼叫，而且無法用於未來的作業。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Unable to complete <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact*> operation.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>.
Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> to be retrieved.
<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> associated with the supplied <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>.
peerName is .
This <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*> object has been disposed.
- Contact not found in <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
- Unable to obtain the contact for the supplied <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>.

Returns a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"></xref> that contains all contacts within the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"></xref>包含中的所有連絡人<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>遠端對等。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.

<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"></xref> that contains all contacts within the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"></xref>其中包含內的所有連絡人<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>遠端對等。

trans-unit.source: If the contact manager is empty, then a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果連絡人管理員是空的然後集合大小的零 (0) 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> object has been disposed.
An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> in this peer contact collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試列舉時，傳回無效的值<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref>中這個對等連絡集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> representing the local peer.
Unless specified, the default value for this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有指定，這個屬性的預設值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Using this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance representing the local peer.

Raised whenever the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*> associated with a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> has changed.
The associated callback provides a reference to the new <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>.
This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
To be added.
The calling object has been disposed.
Raised whenever an object within a contact’s registered <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> objects has changed.
trans-unit.target: 當連絡人內之物件的註冊時，引發<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>物件已變更。

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: 可能會引發此事件之前，遠端對等的目前使用者必須訂閱的主控件的對等共同作業事件。

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the PeerContact <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 訂閱透過 PeerContact 完成<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
To be added.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> object has been disposed.

Raised whenever the presence status of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: 每當引發的線上狀態， <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>中<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>已變更。

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: 可能會引發此事件之前，遠端對等的目前使用者必須訂閱的主控件的對等共同作業事件。

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> method.
This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
To be added.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object has been disposed.
Raised when the list of subscribed contacts changes.
trans-unit.target: 訂閱的連絡人清單變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: Since subscriptions are per user and not per process or per application domain, another application running on the host may also cause this event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 因為訂用帳戶每位使用者並不是依處理序或應用程式定義域，另一個主機上執行的應用程式也可能導致引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
To be added.
The object has been disposed.

When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性值時，做為非同步作業的結果不引發的所有事件都將都有相關聯的事件處理常式建立特定<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>的執行緒上回呼

trans-unit.source: The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: 預設設定值，這個屬性是`null`，表示所有事件處理常式會在系統執行緒集區執行緒上都呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set to a UI element such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性通常這類設定的 UI 項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: Object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.
trans-unit.target: 物件，用於實作<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref>介面，並建立它的執行緒上的事件處理常式同步處理對這個型別的執行個體所使用。

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
Updates the data associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>.
Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> to be updated.
- <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> not found in <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
peerContact is .
This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object has been disposed.
Unable to complete UpdateContact operation.
trans-unit.target: 無法完成 UpdateContact 作業。
